short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RefAssured Connect integrates with your ATS, ensuring you can start, view, and manage your reference checks from anywhere!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The future of references is here. 

With RefAssured Connect you will:
- Reduce time and save money
- Make informed hiring decisions
- Increase successful hires
- Create new client and candidate relationships
